mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (qnum, title, writer, content, category) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(max(qnum), 0)+1 FROM qna), #{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{category})
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, regDate= sysdate, category=#{category} WHERE qnum=#{qnum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM qna WHERE writer=#{writer} ORDER BY qnum DESC
